pull.title: tests: Add fuzzing harness for serialization/deserialization of floating-points and integrals
pull.body:
Add simple fuzzing harness for functions with floating-point parameters (such as `ser_double_to_uint64(double)`, etc.).

Add serialization/deserialization fuzzing for integral types.

Add missing includes.

To test this PR:

```
$ make distclean
$ ./autogen.sh
$ CC=clang CXX=clang++ ./configure --enable-fuzz \
      --with-sanitizers=address,fuzzer,undefined
$ make
$ src/test/fuzz/float
…
```

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #18190 (tests: Add fuzzing harness for Golomb-Rice coding (GolombRiceEncode/GolombRiceDecode) by practicalswift)
* #18086 (Accurately account for mempool index memory by sipa)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

issue.title: Accurately account for mempool index memory
issue.body:
This introduces a C++ allocator class (`memusage::AccountingAllocator`) which enables containers that accurately account for all their memory allocations in a tracker variable.

This is then used to replace the heuristics in the mempool to guess memory usage.

issue.title: tests: Add fuzzing harness for Golomb-Rice coding (GolombRiceEncode/GolombRiceDecode)
issue.body:
Add fuzzing harness for Golomb-Rice coding (`GolombRiceEncode`/`GolombRiceDecode`).

Test this PR using:

```
$ make distclean
$ ./autogen.sh
$ CC=clang CXX=clang++ ./configure --enable-fuzz \
      --with-sanitizers=address,fuzzer,undefined
$ make
$ src/test/fuzz/golomb_rice
…
```

issue.title: Bitcoin PR tracking
issue.body: The main purpose of this issue is to keep track of Pull Requests on Bitcoin since version 0.19.1 identifying those which make a porting LitecoinZ.

comments.body: Could also assert that the data stream is empty after each operation?
